body.name: Alphx Universal Smartphone Tripod Cell Phone Holder Mount Adapter Set, Fits iPhone, Samsung, and All Phones, Rotates Vertical and Horizontal with Adjustable Clamp, Includes Mini Tripod

features: Cell phone tripod adapter with adjustable clamp from 2.25 inches to 4 inches (58mm - 101mm) wide
Set includes mini 4" tabletop travel tripod with standard 1/4" screw thread, flexible legs, and rubber feet
360 degree rotating phone holder for portrait mode (vertical) or landscape mode (horizontal)
Holds any smartphone securely to any standard tripod, monopod or selfie stick even with a phone case
Helps you shoot steady videos for Tiktok, Instagram, and other live streaming video platforms
body.description: MINI 4" INCH TRIPOD WITH THIS PURCHASE! SET INCLUDES ADAPTER AND TRIPOD AS PICTURED! CELL PHONE TRIPOD MOUNT compatible with Android, Windows, Apple Smartphones measuring 2.44" to 4.06" wide; Universal Phone Tripod Attachment for iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, X, XS, XS Max, XR, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7, 6 Plus, 6, 6s Plus, 6s Smart Phone Tripod Mount for Samsung Galaxy S10e, S10+, S10 5G, S10, S9, S9 Plus, S8, S8 Plus, S7 Edge, Note 5, 4, Google Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 3, Pixel 3 XL, Pixel 3a, Pixel 3a XL, Pixel 4, Pixel 4 XL many other cellphones will fit this Tripod Phone Mount. Built for Plus size phones and makes a great iPhone X Tripod Mount. iPHONE TRIPOD MOUNT ADAPTER made from premium quality plastic and soft protective rubber for extended durability and protection. This Phone Mount for Tripod has a 360 degree rotation, a soft foam backing, and protective lips to prevent your phone from sliding in the cellphone holder. A must have when it comes to iPhone accessories. CELL PHONE TRIPOD MOUNT VERTICAL and HORIZONTAL DESIGN has 360 degrees rotating cell phone holder for portrait mode (vertical) or landscape mode (horizontal). Simply place your phone inside the cellphone mount and affix it to a tripod head to take photos or streaming videos with ease. Built for larger phones this iPhone Adapter makes it a perfect iPhone 8 plus accessories or even Samsung accessories. FITS ANY STANDARD TRIPOD with a 1/4-20 threading screw; Very easy to use and setup, just adjust the knob on the back of the Phone Holder for Tripod to use it in either vertical or horizontal position or take it off the knob and just use the rotating Smartphone Tripod Adapter itself (tripod included) PERFECT TRIPOD MOUNT ADAPTER for IPHONE for taking Selfies and recording videos or vlog hands-free, great iPhone X adapter or iPhone 8 Adapter (Not intended for use as a stand without a tripod)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
reviews.reviewText: Excellent fit for purpose. Hold my phone steady and firm for still photos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but could be better
reviews.reviewText: The legs needed to be more stronger to stay, other than that it’s fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It grips well.
reviews.reviewText: I was having trouble gripping my cellphone not only because there is no border to safely grab without sending my application window to Valhalla but because old A.G.E. decided that I would have pain when I grasped something. With this I can either stand my phone on the table or grip the bracket various ways to ease pain and not trigger an app catastrophe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and unstable
reviews.reviewText: Not a good quality product. I should have known better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. Hard to balance and hard to get level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality. I would recommend a little bigger size if I was going to order another one. It is just a little shorter than I really needed. It is kind of close on being able to hold up my phone.. but otherwise good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Universal phone stand works great with my tripod!
reviews.reviewText: This item did not come with a remote. The phone clamp has a screw dial to adjust how wide it is so it fits my Galaxy S21. I like that it has the universal threaded hole that fits on my tall tripod. The flexible mini tripod is great for surfaces like my desk or the kitchen counter. I'm using this combo to hold my phone to display recipes while I cook!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for starting
reviews.reviewText: Not the sturdiest Tripod. The feet don’t want to stay adjusted and like to move back to a more default position. The item is smaller than imagined definitely look at the product details.So far product remains intact and functional. The phone holding piece is definitely worth it and since most charge this amount for the single piece this is great for people with out a tripod already.
